div.p: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.

I would like to thank you for your invitation. I'm pleased you send one to me. I will be there for sure ! I wouldn't miss your 21th birthday. I would be very happy if I could help you in any way ... I can bring desert, or come earlier to help you organize everything. Let me now !
Can't wait to see you on saturday! It's going to be a party we'll never forget about.
